outputs.output_descr: The objective of this project is rehabilitation of visually and hearing impaired people and their further social and economic integration in the society. The project has four interrelated components: 1) Capacity of DBST members enhanced to increase their employment opportunities and to contribute to their integration into the society; 2)National legislation analyzed with an objective to review its compliance with Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities ; 3)Employment opportunities of persons with disabilities promoted; 4) Awareness of general public and stakeholders  raised on challenges of socio-economic integration of PWDs.

project_descr: Advancement of social inclusion and integration of Persons With Disabilities (PWDs)
project_title: Advancement of social inclusion and integration of PWDs
